channel.title: Prixus - Bringing Back Oldschool Bitches! [BETA]
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]https://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/large-home-icons/16/Small_house_home_arrow_building.png[/img][url=http://Prixus.us]Homepage[/url] | [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5tuon8.png[/img][url=http://Prixus.us/webclient]Webclient[/url] | [IMG]http://i4.minus.com/iSGwRmvs7QfGp.png[/img][url=http://Prixus.us/forums]Forums[/url] | [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/jfx7v4.png[/img][url=http://Prixus.us/Prixus.jar]Desktop Client[/url]
[B]Introduction:[/B]
Prixus is a professional oldschool server that aims to entertain, striving for nothing but perfection and endless fun. We have no other goal than to become one of the greatest oldschool servers out there. We are community driven and the server aswell as the website has a professional layout for easy use. So what are you waiting for? Join [url=http://prixus.us/webclient]Prixus[/url] now!
[B]Community:[/B] Prixus attracts a mature community, most members on the server are layed back, and are chilled out, we rarely have to ban anyone. Our staff are extremely friendly, mature and a pleasure to be around, they will always go out there way to help you, and will not punish you unless they really have to. We have an active new forums that is active, so if you're joining make sure to sign up.
[B]Minigames:[/B]
Duel Arena (Bug free) Pest Control (Awards you with pest points upon game finish) Tzhaar Cave (1 wave, kill Jad to obtain Firecape) Barrows Fighting Pits
[B] Prixus might just be one of the best Runescape Private Servers you'll ever play.[/B]
[SPOILER=Spoiler for some major features]- Features - * All Godswords with Real Special * 100% Duel Arena (Staking,Rules,and ability to disable armor slots, fixed all bugs) * Perfect hybridding, with insane quick item switching * 100% working clan chat * Slayer with Tasks * 100% working obelisks that teleport you around in wild * Fixed all recent dupes, and patched all item spawning methods with cheatengine and other cheat clients * 99 appears in yell form. * 100% rs overload effect. * 100% working telegrab. * Added humidify spell. * Original rs hits, not that x10 shit. * Added killstreaks, fully working with rewards * Skill point system(You receive 10 points per level up) * Ice & earth zone coded, you receive ice points & earth points(You spend those points on items in the ice & earth shop * In-game hiscores * 100% Prayer skill training [Gilded altar/Burners/Dropmenu/Cycle event]
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Spoiler for media]Ripped most of them from the original base, was too lazy making new ones. [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/35buhox.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/mwveyb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/nd7y3o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/20f6lok.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/wtejdk.png][/img]
[url=http://prntscr.com/4fbdve]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/4fbf4h]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url]
Random video one of my players made
[video=youtube;sxGhxQlZyQ4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=sxGhxQlZyQ4[/video]
[/SPOILER][/CENTER]

item.title: Prixus - Bringing Back Oldschool Bitches! [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Old school was already brought back. Other than that it pretty much looks like you used your beginner java tutorial skills to add fields to the player save, send a message packet to all players, and add a command. I also love how you talk about prayer being so good while it’s the easiest skill to manufacture. 0/10.

Read full topic

item.title: Prixus - Bringing Back Oldschool Bitches! [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @Mobster92 Mobster92
item.description:
@Mobster92 wrote:

[quote=“Demontage, post:3, topic:546157”][quote author=Mobster92 link=topic=665053.msg4445780#msg4445780 date=1408733528]
Horrible, very buggy. Poor professionalism…

1/10
[/quote]

You didn’t even log in.[/quote]

Yes I did, how would you even know? Lmao, first of all.

Says old school.

Advertisement shows dicing and Claws.

&

100% godsword spec yet you cant even get a godsword because your custom godwars doesnt even work.

Read full topic

item.title: Prixus - Bringing Back Oldschool Bitches! [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @Demontage Demontage
item.description:
@Demontage wrote:

[CENTER]
Homepage | Webclient | Forums | Desktop Client

[B]Introduction:[/B]

Prixus is a professional oldschool server that aims to entertain, striving for nothing but perfection and endless fun.
We have no other goal than to become one of the greatest oldschool servers out there. We are community driven and the server aswell as the website has a professional layout for easy use. So what are you waiting for? Join Prixus now!

[B]Community:[/B]
Prixus attracts a mature community, most members on the server are layed back, and are chilled out, we rarely have to ban anyone. Our staff are extremely friendly, mature and a pleasure to be around, they will always go out there way to help you, and will not punish you unless they really have to. We have an active new forums that is active, so if you’re joining make sure to sign up.

[B]Minigames:[/B]

Duel Arena (Bug free)
Pest Control (Awards you with pest points upon game finish)
Tzhaar Cave (1 wave, kill Jad to obtain Firecape)
Barrows
Fighting Pits

[B]
Prixus might just be one of the best Runescape Private Servers you’ll ever play.[/B]

[SPOILER=Spoiler for some major features]- Features -

  • All Godswords with Real Special
  • 100% Duel Arena (Staking,Rules,and ability to disable armor slots, fixed all bugs)
  • Perfect hybridding, with insane quick item switching
  • 100% working clan chat
  • Slayer with Tasks
  • 100% working obelisks that teleport you around in wild
  • Fixed all recent dupes, and patched all item spawning methods with cheatengine and other cheat clients
  • 99 appears in yell form.
  • 100% rs overload effect.
  • 100% working telegrab.
  • Added humidify spell.
  • Original rs hits, not that x10 shit.
  • Added killstreaks, fully working with rewards
  • Skill point system(You receive 10 points per level up)
  • Ice & earth zone coded, you receive ice points & earth points(You spend those points on items in the ice & earth shop
  • In-game hiscores
  • 100% Prayer skill training [Gilded altar/Burners/Dropmenu/Cycle event]

[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Spoiler for media]Ripped most of them from the original base, was too lazy making new ones.
